events.message: I ordered a package more than two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for several days.
Case has been identified as a delivery delay issue based on the customer's message referencing late shipping and tracking status.
A customer service agent has been assigned to this case to investigate the delayed shipment and assist the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. Let's see how we can help resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can check the shipment status for you?
Sure, the order number is 789654123 and the tracking number is TRK987654321. The last update on the tracking was five days ago.
Thank you for the info. I have contacted the shipping provider and asked for an expedited investigation. We can also offer a partial refund if the package doesn't arrive in the next three days.
I appreciate your prompt response and the offer of a partial refund if the delay continues. I will wait for your update.
The package has now been delivered according to the latest shipment update. Please let us know if you experience any other issues.
Just following up to ensure you received your package and that everything is satisfactory with your order.
Since the delivery delay issue has been resolved, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
